suggest.meta_keywords: Edge Computing, JavaScript, Edge Functions, GeoIP Country Code, Response Headers, Country-Specific Logic, Event Handling, Network Security, Web Application Development, API Requests
suggest.meta_description: Explore how geo-location data in Edge Computing enables dynamic web application responses using Edge Functions and JavaScript.

current.meta_description: Based on the country code, accessed through event.request.metadata['geoip_country_code'], a response header is added through event.addResponseHeader().
